p: Meanwhile, Aedes albopictus mosquitoes were collected around epidemic focal sites both indoors and outdoors. The larvae were reared to adulthood under standard laboratory conditions (28 ± 2 °C at 75–85% relative humidity). The emerging adults were maintained for 3–4 days, sorted by species and gender, pooled (50 individuals/pool), and then stored at −80°C [ 20].
